message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_PROOF_STATUS_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Acceptance Status can only be selected if a file location is entered.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_PROOF_REJ_REASON_SHOULD_BE_SELECTED_IF_STATUS_SELECTED_REJECTED
message.locale: Rejection Reason can only be selected if Acceptance Status is ‘Rejected’.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_PROOF_COMMENTS_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_REJ_REASON_OTHER
message.locale: If 'Other' is selected then a Description must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_PROOF_REJ_REASON_SHOULD_BE_BLANK_IF_STATUS_SELECTED_ACCEPTED
message.locale: The Rejection Reason must be blank if Status is selected as Accepted.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_VALID_ATTACHMENT_EXTENSIONS
message.locale: Attachment File type must be: .jpg, .jpeg, .MP4, MP3, .wav, .MPEG, .tif, iOS images, .png, .pdf, .docx, .xlsx., .doc, or .xls

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATION_VALID_ATTACHMENT_SIZE
message.locale: The uploaded file size cannot exceed 5MB.
